text: Nangni'n ulenai miring inkhat in thinasik kasuokmak manu atho inchu, nangni'n Pathian diang ningnipisik eii, halli Pathian in inmani diang ringna apesik eii. Hiwahi thinasik kasuokmak manu katho inmani diang katina eii. Takkha thinasik kasuok manu om, halli kei'n khawasik jarra nangnidiang Pathian niru kiti emak.
